examples: This dish will serve four hungry people.
To do the dishes.
The restaurant offered a vegetarian dish with a mix of seasonal vegetables.
The chef sprinkled a generous amount of roe on the dish.
The restaurant offered a specialty hamburger steak dish.
words.defineEn: a flat, shallow container for cooking food in or serving it from
words.defineVi: một hộp phẳng, nông để nấu thức ăn trong hoặc phục vụ nó từ

examples: The spoon dropped with a clatter from her hand.
She spooned a velvety hollandaise sauce over her grilled asparagus
He dipped a spoon into the luscious flesh of the ripe cantaloupe.
The chef tasted the sauce with a small spoon.
The boy was born with a silver spoon in his mouth.
words.defineEn: an object that has a handle with a shallow bowl at one end, used for eating, serving, or stirring food
words.defineVi: một vật có tay cầm với một cái bát cạn ở một đầu, dùng để ăn, phục vụ hoặc khuấy thức ăn

examples: You put the fork on the right and the knife on the left.
The children used a plastic fork to eat their pasta.
I used a fork to eat the spaghetti.
I usually use a fork to cut into a tender piece of meat.
You dug your own grave with your own knife and fork when the exams came.
words.defineEn: an object with a handle and three or four sharp points that we use for picking up and eating food
words.defineVi: một vật có tay cầm và ba hoặc bốn đầu nhọn mà chúng ta dùng để gắp và ăn thức ăn

examples: Any more cuts in government aid to these poor people will be twisting the knife in the wound.
With a sharp knife, the chef expertly removed the gristle from the pork chops.
Emily's father went under the knife yesterday for a successful heart surgery.
We used the chef's knife to chop the onions.
He carefully peeled the apple with a sharp knife.
words.defineEn: a sharp blade with a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon
words.defineVi: một lưỡi kiếm sắc bén có tay cầm, dùng để cắt hoặc làm vũ khí

examples: I dropped another plate!
They used disposable plates for the picnic.
The restaurant served a mouthwatering plate of spaghetti with bolognese pasta sauce.
Our waiter cleared the empty plates from the table.
The plate of pasta was finished with a garnish of grated Parmesan cheese.
words.defineEn: a flat, typically round dish that we eat from or serve food on
words.defineVi: một đĩa phẳng, thường tròn mà chúng ta ăn hoặc phục vụ thức ăn trên

examples: He wears glasses now.
That's glass.
Please fill my glass with water.
They collected glass bottles for a recycling project.
They happily raised their glasses for a toast.
words.defineEn: a container that is used for drinks and is made of glass
words.defineVi: một thùng chứa được sử dụng cho đồ uống và được làm bằng thủy tinh

examples: The waiter opened the bottle of wine for the guests.
She hits the bottle every couple of years.
He killed three bottles of rum.
They collected glass bottles for a recycling project.
I brought a bottle of Pinot grape wine as a gift to the dinner party.
words.defineEn: a glass or plastic container that has a narrow neck and is used for storing drinks or other liquids
words.defineVi: một hộp thủy tinh hoặc nhựa có cổ hẹp và được sử dụng để đựng đồ uống hoặc các chất lỏng khác

examples: A cup of coffee hits the spot at any given time.
A cup of tea sounds perfect.
Would you like a cup of coffee?
She passed a cup of tea to the headmaster.
I could murder a cup of tea!
words.defineEn: a small bowl-shaped container, usually with a handle, that we use for drinking tea, coffee, etc.
words.defineVi: một cái hộp nhỏ hình bát, thường có tay cầm, chúng ta dùng để uống trà, cà phê, v.v.

examples: The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
I dried my hands with a soft towel.
We packed our beach bag with sunscreen, towels, and beach toys.
I usually use a microfiber towel for cleaning glass surfaces.
He used a towel to dry his hair after swimming.
words.defineEn: a piece of cloth or paper that we use for drying our body or things such as dishes
words.defineVi: một mảnh vải hoặc giấy mà chúng tôi sử dụng để làm khô cơ thể hoặc những thứ như bát đĩa

examples: He dropped the slippery soap in the shower.
We used antibacterial soap to keep germs away.
I washed my face and hands with a bar of soap.
She organized shampoo and soap bottles in the shower caddy in the bathroom.
He gently washed his face with warm water and soap.
words.defineEn: the substance we use with water for washing and cleaning our body
words.defineVi: chất chúng ta sử dụng với nước để rửa và làm sạch cơ thể của chúng tôi

examples: I had a brush with him a number of years ago.
The chef brushed a sweet glaze made of honey and soy sauce onto the grilled salmon.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
She had a brush with stardom in the eighties as a member of a minor pop band.
The hairstylist used a round brush to create curls.
words.defineEn: an object that has hair or thin pieces of plastic or wood attached to a handle that we use for making our hair tidy
words.defineVi: một vật có tóc hoặc những miếng nhựa hoặc gỗ mỏng gắn vào tay cầm mà chúng ta dùng để làm tóc gọn gàng

examples: They replaced their old toothbrushes with new ones.
I usually use a toothbrush with a small head to reach the back teeth easily.
The dentist recommended using an electric toothbrush for better cleaning.
He applied toothpaste to his toothbrush and started brushing his teeth in circular motions.
The dentist showed me the proper technique for brushing and gave me a new toothbrush.
words.defineEn: a small brush with a long handle that we use for cleaning our teeth
words.defineVi: một bàn chải nhỏ có tay cầm dài mà chúng tôi sử dụng để làm sạch răng của chúng tôi

examples: The children had pillow fights during their sleepover.
My motrher decorated her room with new curtains and pillows.
As they say, a clean conscience makes a soft pillow.
Sarah used to cuddle her pillow for comfort and relaxation.
As the proverb goes, an honest man's pillow is his peace of mind.
words.defineEn: a cloth bag stuffed with soft materials that we put our head on when we are lying or sleeping
words.defineVi: một túi vải nhồi bằng vật liệu mềm mà chúng ta gối đầu khi nằm hoặc ngủ

examples: The children threw the crumpled paper balls into the classroom trash can.
He emptied the full trash can into the larger dumpster outside.
She accidentally knocked over the trash can, spilling its contents.
Sarah used a trash can with a lid to prevent odors.
He found a discarded toy in the trash can and decided to keep it.
words.defineEn: a plastic or metal container with a lid, used for putting garbage in and usually kept outside the house
words.defineVi: thùng nhựa hoặc kim loại có nắp đậy, dùng để đựng rác và thường được để bên ngoài nhà

examples: Check the box next to the right answer.
We label our boxes with permanent markers for easy identification.
A large cardboard box will serve the purpose.
The chicken laid an egg in the nesting box.
They pushed the heavy box across the room.
words.defineEn: a container made of wood, thick card, metal, etc. with a flat base and sides, often square or rectangular and having a lid
words.defineVi: một hộp làm bằng gỗ, thẻ dày, kim loại, v.v. có đế và các mặt phẳng, thường là hình vuông hoặc hình chữ nhật và có nắp

examples: I bought a toy for my nephew's birthday.
The little boy's favorite toy was a blue car.
The child's room was filled with colorful toys.
I gave my little brother a toy for his birthday.
We spent hours building structures with construction toys.
words.defineEn: an object that looks like a car, person, house, etc. designed for children to play with
words.defineVi: một đồ vật trông giống như ô tô, người, ngôi nhà, v.v. được thiết kế cho trẻ em chơi cùng

examples: I see things differently now.
Things certainly move fast in the blogosphere.
Things like this take time.
Things have changed dramatically since then.
Finally things are moving in the right direction.
words.defineEn: an object that we cannot or do not need to name when we are talking about it
words.defineVi: một đối tượng mà chúng ta không thể hoặc không cần đặt tên khi nói về nó

examples: The squash player killed the ball with a nick.

Everyone had a ball at the party.

words.defineVi: một vật tròn được sử dụng làm đồ chơi hoặc trong các trò chơi và thể thao, chẳng hạn như bóng đá, bóng rổ, bowling, v.v.

examples: She dressed up her doll in a beautiful pink dress.
She went bananas over a doll.
My grandmother collects porcelain dolls and has a vast display in her living room.
We organized a tea party for our dolls with tiny cups and saucers.
My friend had a doll with a voice recorder that could say different phrases.
words.defineEn: a toy for children that usually looks like a small baby
words.defineVi: một món đồ chơi cho trẻ em mà thường trông giống như một đứa trẻ nhỏ
